title: Generate and wire correct images for Sakthi Snacks items (Jalebi, Veg Frankie Roll, Veg Momos, Veg Sandwich)

requirements.text: Generate new, correct dish images (without user uploads) for Sakthi Snacks menu items: Jalebi, Vegetable Frankie Roll, Vegetable Momos, and Vegetable Sandwich, and add them as static assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using the filenames specified in the Image Requirements.

quotes: change the image of jilebi and generate by yourself

acceptanceCriteria: The following image files exist under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and render correctly in a browser: `dish-sakthi-jalebi.dim_512x512.png`, `dish-sakthi-vegetable-frankie-roll.dim_512x512.png`, `dish-sakthi-vegetable-momos.dim_512x512.png`, `dish-sakthi-vegetable-sandwich.dim_512x512.png`.

Each generated image visually matches the dish implied by its filename (Jalebi is a syrupy spiral dessert; momos are steamed dumplings; frankie roll is a wrap/roll; vegetable sandwich is a layered sandwich).

requirements.text: Update `frontend/src/utils/imageFallbacks.ts` so the dish-name mapping resolves these Sakthi Snacks items to the newly generated dish assets: `jalebi`, `vegetable frankie roll`, `vegetable momos` (including the existing `vegetable momos (6 pcs)` normalized key), and `vegetable sandwich`.

quotes: change the image of jilebi and generate by yourself

acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/utils/imageFallbacks.ts`, the `DISH_NAME_TO_IMAGE` entries for `jalebi`, `vegetable frankie roll`, `vegetable momos`, `vegetable momos (6 pcs)`, and `vegetable sandwich` point to the new `/assets/generated/dish-sakthi-*.dim_512x512.png` paths.
When `getDishImageUrl` is called with an empty/legacy `imageUrl` and a matching dish name, it returns the new Sakthi image path rather than the generic dish fallback.

requirements.text: Update the seeded Sakthi Snacks (restaurantId = 7) menu items in `backend/main.mo` so their `imageUrl` values for Jalebi, Vegetable Frankie Roll, Vegetable Momos, and Vegetable Sandwich correspond to the new generated static assets under `/assets/generated/` (or are set to an empty string so the frontend name-based mapping resolves to the correct new images).

quotes: change the image of jilebi and generate by yourself

acceptanceCriteria: `backend/main.mo` no longer seeds legacy/mismatched `imageUrl` values for Sakthi Snacks items: Jalebi, Vegetable Frankie Roll, Vegetable Momos, Vegetable Sandwich.

After loading the Restaurants list and Sakthi Snacks restaurant detail page, these four menu items display the newly generated images (either via direct `imageUrl` or via name-based mapping when `imageUrl` is empty/legacy).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in `backend/main.mo` (no additional backend services).
Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or the immutable hook entrypoints listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Store generated images as static assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and reference them via `/assets/generated/...` paths (do not serve images via the backend).
nonGoals: Do not change authentication (Internet Identity) behavior.
Do not redesign other restaurantsâ€™ menus or images beyond the four specified Sakthi Snacks items.
Do not add real-time features, external databases, or third-party auth providers.

required: Close-up studio photo of bright orange jalebi spirals soaked in sugar syrup, on a small plate, high detail (dish-sakthi-jalebi.dim_512x512.png)
Close-up studio photo of a vegetable frankie roll/wrap (flatbread roll) sliced to show filling, with chutney, high detail (dish-sakthi-vegetable-frankie-roll.dim_512x512.png)
Close-up studio photo of steamed vegetable momos/dumplings arranged on a plate with dipping sauce, high detail (dish-sakthi-vegetable-momos.dim_512x512.png)
Close-up studio photo of a fresh vegetable sandwich with visible layers (tomato, cucumber, lettuce), on a plate, high detail (dish-sakthi-vegetable-sandwich.dim_512x512.png)
